title: His One Sweet Thing
description: When his ex wife's family insists on keeping their holiday traditions alive Marcus Dalton is more than a little surprised to see the changes in the young girl his brother in law had raised after his army buddy passed away years ago. Having missed the past three years of the college Co-Ed's life he's not only shocked by the stunningly beautiful girl's all grown up body but he's thrown off guard when it seems she's propositioning him.This is a short story 11 800 words approximately
author: Jordan Silver
